display_name: Calculated - RDI in NREM sleep (>= 3% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or NREM sleep time is 1
calculation: rdimnr3p  = 60*(hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 + manrbp3 + manrop3)/(slpprdp - minremp)
